name: SEMA-4
description:
STORY

You're a robot alchemist girl. You were having a nice tea party with your friends until a robot witch with a mean attitude came to ruin it! She zapped all your friends, turning them against you. You decide to get out there and show her what you're made of! Avenge your tea party! With A GUN!

GAMEPLAY

Default controls are:

  • W, A, S, D for directional movement
  • P to pause

Your objective is to kill all enemies in the level, which is a very small, 3x3 grid. You fire automatically by moving. There are 4 levels, the last of which is a boss.
Every enemy has a slightly different behavior, therefore yielding more or less points depending on the threat it poses.

FEATURES
  • A colorful cast of machines
  • Three difficulty levels - Waltz, Swing and Mambo. Note that the game can be quite difficult on its own.
  • Different color palettes to suit your tastes
  • A simple control scheme - requires only 5 buttons!
  • Fullscreen support
  • Soundtrack composed by warfpea!!!
EXTRAS

The "Extras" file includes some concept sketches and the game's OST. The sketches were made by STARMAGIC, the music was made by warfpea (except for one track).

Also, here's a link to the game's OST, uploaded on YouTube! (correction: it'll be here when we're done uploading the tracks, please wait patiently)

NOTE

This game creates a user directory named "sema-4". Your save and config are stored there. For Windows, that's in [username]/AppData/Roaming. For Linux and MacOS, that's ~/.local/share/godot/app_userdata.

There shouldn't be any issues with Linux / MacOS versions due to how Godot's export templates work, but in case any arise, please report them. We have not tested these at all lmao
